card_text: 2 Level 9 monsters$NOnce per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then activate 1 of these effects;$N●Banish 1 card your opponent controls.$N●Banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand.$N●Banish 1 card from your opponent's GY.$N●Banish the top card of your opponent's Deck, face-up.
